entry.title: Personalise Your Perfume Bottle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Spritzybytypsy
Type: Perfume
Price: 2799.00

Now you can add a custom touch to your favourite Typsy Beauty fragrance. Whether it's your name, a special date, or a short message, we’ll etch it beautifully onto your bottle—turning your perfume into a keepsake that’s uniquely yours.

Perfect for gifting (or treating yourself), this customization adds a luxurious, heartfelt detail to any fragrance.

✨ Choose your scent

✨ Add your custom text

✨ We engrave it with love

Because your fragrance should be as unforgettable as you are.

Please note - 

This item will be shipped within 7–10 business days.

It will be securely packaged in our original monocarton box.

Please note that this item is non-returnable and non-cancellable once the order is place

Elevate your scent game with this power-packed fragrance combo—featuring the Mixology Experience Set and our signature Fragrance Bracelet. Whether you're discovering your signature scent or carrying it with you in style, this set is made to delight.

✨ Mix, match & personalize your own fragrance with 8 Extrait De Parfum miniatures crafted in France.
✨ Wear your scent all day long with the chic, refillable Fragrance Bracelet—designed to diffuse your favorite perfume gently and stylishly.

Perfect for gifting or treating yourself, this combo is travel-friendly, endlessly customizable, and effortlessly cool.

entry.title: Mixology Experience Kit
entry.summary:
Vendor: Typsy Beauty
Type: Perfume
Price: 899.00

Discover the art of fragrance layering with our Mixology Experience Kit, a curated set of 8 Extrait De Parfum bottles crafted in France. Create your own scent mood with this super-giftable and travel-friendly fragrance book! This mini perfume set allows you to mix, match, experiment and personalize your own unique scent before committing to a full-sized bottle.

  • 1 x 3ml Vanilla Whispers AM  - Vanilla AM embodies modern elegance with creamy vanilla, delicate jasmine, and lavender. Fresh top notes greet the morning, while a warm, velvety base lingers in effortless luxury. Feminine, refined, and timeless.

  • 1 x 3ml Vanilla Whispers PM - Vanilla PM is a bold, sweet indulgence with caramel, amber, and sandalwood, enriched by exotic florals and musk. Sensual and mysterious, it’s perfect for glamorous evenings and unforgettable nights.

  • 1 x 3ml Amber Elixir AM  - Amber AM is a sophisticated blend of amber, saffron, and brown sugar, balanced with jasmine and cedarwood. Warm and elegant, it leaves a luxurious trail of quiet strength and refinement.

  • 1 x 3ml Amber Elixir PM - Amber PM is a bold fusion of pink pepper, saffron, and smoky leather, softened by caramel, vanilla, and amber. Seductive and rebellious, it’s for the woman who commands attention effortlessly.

  • 1 x 3ml Cafe Noir AM - Coffee AM is a cozy blend of fresh coffee, creamy milk, and cinnamon, evoking a quiet morning’s warmth. Subtle yet profound, it’s perfect for those who cherish life’s simple pleasures.

  • 1 x 3ml Cafe Noir PM - Coffee PM is a bold night scent with rich coffee, spicy cardamom, and chili, softened by vanilla and brandy. Magnetic and intense, it’s perfect for a confident, unforgettable presence.

  • 1 x 3ml Forbidden Jasmine AM - A crisp, luminous floral with bright jasmine and creamy sandalwood. Effortlessly elegant, refined, and perfect for those who love timeless, understated beauty.

  • 1 x 3ml Forbidden Jasmine PM - A warm, creamy jasmine with roasted chestnut, cashmere, and sandalwood, accented by vanilla and cherry blossom. Cozy yet sensual, perfect for intimate evenings or quiet nights in.

entry.title: Amber Elixir
entry.summary:
Vendor: Typsy Beauty
Type: Perfume
Price: 2299.00

AM Story:  

Accords - Amber, Aromatic, Sweet, Woody  

Amber AM is a sophisticated fragrance for the woman who commands attention without speaking. It blends sweet amber and saffron with warm brown sugar and toffee, creating an elegant and sensual scent. Its heart of jasmine and cedarwood adds balance, while ambergris and fir resin deepen the warmth, leaving a luxurious trail of quiet strength and refinement. A fragrance for those who exude effortless elegance. 

AM Notes

TOP: Saffron, Jasmine  

MID: Amber, Brown Sugar, Ambergris   

BASE: Toffee, Oakmoss, Ambroxan, Cedar   

  

PM Story:  

Accords - Amber, Vanilla, Leather, Spicy  

Amber PM is for the fearless, rebellious woman who owns the room. A bold blend of spicy pink pepper, saffron, and smoky leather creates a powerful, seductive scent. Sweet caramel, bourbon vanilla, and amber add warmth, while the leather adds a raw, rebellious edge. This fragrance leaves a captivating trail, perfect for the woman who demands attention and isn’t afraid to break the rules.  

PM  Notes

TOP: Caramel, Saffron, Pink Pepper  

MID: Leather, Tonka Bean, Lily of Valley  

BASE: Bourbon Vanilla, Amber, Musk

entry.title: Café Noir
entry.summary:
Vendor: Typsy Beauty
Type: Perfume
Price: 2299.00

 AM Story:

Accords - Coffee, Aromatic, Sweet, Woody

Coffee AM is a serene, comforting fragrance that captures the essence of a quiet morning. With fresh, aromatic coffee, creamy milk, and a hint of cinnamon, it feels like a warm, indulgent moment. Subtle yet profound, this unisex scent is perfect for those who find peace in life’s simple pleasures and appreciate the calm of the everyday.

  

AM  Notes

TOP - Coffee, Orange Blossom, Red Apple   

MID: Cappuccino, Lavender, Tonka Bean  

BASE: Sandalwood, Vanilla, Vetiver, Milk Mousse 

  

PM Story:  

Accords - Warm Spicy, Coffee, Sweet, Woody, Vanilla  

Coffee PM is a bold, intense fragrance for the night. Rich roasted coffee, spicy cardamom, and chili pepper create a sharp, electrifying opening, while the smooth warmth of vanilla and brandy adds an irresistible depth. Unisex and magnetic, this scent exudes confidence and sensuality, perfect for those who want to make a lasting, unforgettable impression.   

  

PM Notes

TOP - Cardamom, Chilli Pepper  

MID: Salted caramel, Coffee, Cinammon  

BASE: Vanilla, Tobacco, Brandy, Cedar, Musk

entry.title: Forbidden Jasmine
entry.summary:
Vendor: Typsy Beauty
Type: Perfume
Price: 2299.00

AM Story: 

Accords - Citrus, White Floral, Fresh, Fruity, Woody  

Jasmine AM is a crisp, sparkling floral scent that captures the effortless elegance of a woman who radiates grace and simplicity. Bright jasmine smell opens the fragrance with a luminous freshness, softened by creamy sandalwood for a clean, refined balance. Perfect for those who love understated beauty and a timeless, second-skin feel. 

AM Notes

TOP: Yuzu, Limoncello, Kiwi  

MID: Lotus, Jasmine, Orange Blossom  

BASE: Cedar, Vanilla Leaves, White Patchouli, Sandalwood 

 

PM Story:  

Accords - White floral, Sweet, Warm spicy, Nutty  

Jasmine PM is a warm, creamy take on jasmine that feels like a comforting hug, blending lush floral notes with roasted chestnut cashmere and sandalwood. Accented with vanilla cream and a playful touch of cherry blossom, it’s cozy yet sensual—perfect for an intimate evening or a quiet night in.

PM Notes 

TOP - Jasmine sambac, Cherry blossom, Pink pepper  

MID: Chestnut, Marshmallow  

BASE: Sandalwood, Cashmere, Vanilla Cream

entry.title: Vanilla Whispers
entry.summary:
Vendor: Typsy Beauty
Type: Perfume
Price: 2299.00

AM Story: 

Accords - Vanilla, Aromatic, Sweet, Woody

Vanilla AM captures the grace of a modern muse with its sweet, creamy vanilla balanced by floral whispers of jasmine and lavender. Fresh top notes evoke the blush of morning light, while a warm, velevet-like base wraps you in effortless luxury. Feminine, refined, and timeless— this fragrance is for those who command attention with poise and leave a trail of sweet sophistication.

AM Notes

TOP - Lavender, Yuzu 
MIDDLE - Rosewood, Iris, Velvet, Jasmine Sambac
BASE - Vanilla, Sandalwood, Tonka Bean, Licorice Candy, Benzoin, Musk 

 

PM Story: 

Accords - Vanilla, Gourmand, Woody, Amber 

Vanilla PM takes you from day to night with its warm, sugary sweetness and bold sophistication. Opening creamy caramel, it deepens into rich amber and sandalwood, enhanced by exotic florals and musk. Sensual, daring, and unforgettable, this gourmand fragrance is both sweet and mysterious—a perfect blend of indulgence and allure for glamorous evenings or romantic nights. For the confident woman who leaves a bold, lasting impression. 

 PM Notes

TOP - Vanilla Orchid, Jasmine 
MIDDLE - Caramel, Vanilla Frosting, Tonka Bean 
BASE – Amberwood, Musk, Patchouli

entry.title: Fragrance Bracelet
entry.summary:
Vendor: Typsy Beauty
Type:
Price: 499.00

Introducing your new favourite accessory
The Fragrance Bracelet! A chic and practical way to keep you smelling amazing all day long.

Simply spray your favourite perfume onto the sponge, place the sponge into the bracelet and you're ready to go. The bracelet gently releases the scent throughout the day. Comes with 10 sponges in attractive colours. 

Adjustable bracelet, fits all wrist sizes.
